GfxShaderAttributeLinkType

type: C enum
GFX_SHADER_LINK_AUTOMATIC
GFX_SHADER_LINK_DEFAULT_BINDING
GFX_SHADER_LINK_SET_LOCATIONS
GFX_SHADER_LINK_COMPARE_FORMAT
GFX_SHADER_LINK_COUNT

GfxShaderLink

typedef struct {
  GfxShaderAttributeLinkType link_type;
  uint                       attribute_locations[128];
  GfxAttributeFormat         attributes;
} GfxShaderLink;
type: C struct
